content.rendered:
Xenon HID D5S Head Light Conversion Kit

XENON HID UPGRADES

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

If your vehicle comes from the factory fitted with either 25W D5S or 25W D5R HIDs from either Osram or Philips, then our 35W High-Performance Xenon kit is the ultimate upgrade.

The very best HIDs start with the very best components.

– Capsules manufactured by APL in the USA.
– Xenon gas from Messer in Germany
– 100% Philips quartz glass guarantee our D5X HID kit will not cause any UV damage to your headlamps.
– 5500K CCT

We’ve bumped up the power up to 35W as compared to 25W for the OE Philips and Osram units that are factory fitted. The net result is that we’ve been able to achieve 176% increase in lux.

The fit, finish, and connectors perfectly match the factory fitted units, so installation completely plays & play. Additionally, the igniter ballasts are built-in, so no additional cable management required.

D5X COMPATIBILITY

Volkswagen: Tiguan (HID Models)
Volkswagen: Golf MK7 (2015-2018)
Volkswagen: Passat
Ford: Mustang FM (2015-2018)
Mitsubishi: Triton MQ (2015-2018)
Alfa Romeo: 4C (2013-2018)
Alfa Romeo: Giulia (2016-2018)
Audi: A3 S3 8V (2016-2018)
Audi: A4 B9 (2015-2018)
Audi: A6 4G (2014-2018)
Audi: Q3 8U (2014-2018)
Audi: Q7 4M (2015-2018)
Audi: TT 8S FV3 (2014-2018)
Audi: TT 8S FV9 (2014-2018)
Citroen: C4 Grand Picasso II (2014-2018)
Citroen: C4 Picasso II (2014-2018)
Fiat: 500X (2014-2018)
Opel / Vauxhall: Corsa E (2014-2018)
Skoda: Rapid (2014-2018)
Skoda: Superb (2015-2018)
Kia: Forte (2017-2018)
Hyundai: Elantra (2017-2018)
Maserati: Ghibli (2014-2018)
Jeep: Renegade (2017-2018)
NO MERCURY: Our Xenon HID Conversion Kits use no mercury.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Our HID Conversion Kits come with a 100% money back guarantee within 30 days. You’re welcome to install and use our conversion kit, and if you’re not 100% satisfied, send them back to us for a no questions asked refund.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL 6063 Aviation Aluminium
HID TYPE Xenon
INPUT POWER 35W
ACTUAL LUMENS 3,400Lm
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 3,000 hours
CANBUS BUILT-IN
SOCKET TYPE D5S and D5R
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI Xenon HID D5S Headlight Globes

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI D5S XENON 35W HID BULBS (PAIR)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
